summary: The adventure of Cutie Honey, a super heroine who can transform into anything using her necklace to switch on and say "Honey Flash!".
cast: Eriko Satô|Mikako Ichikawa|Jun Murakami|Mitsuhiro Oikawa|Hairi Katagiri|Sie Kohinata|Mayumi Shintani|Ryô Kase|Ryô Iwamatsu|Suzuki Matsuo|Kyûsaku Shimada|Ryûhei Matsuda|Masaki Kyômoto|Hideko Yoshida|Tôru Tezuka|Eisuke Sakai|Kumi Koda|Mihoko Abukawa|Saori Itô|Katsuhito Ishii|Yoji Tanaka|Madeleine Blaustein|J. title: Kyûtî Hanî
